name: Bob Blobinson's Epic Quest for the Holy Furnitures
name_original: Bob Blobinson's Epic Quest for the Holy Furnitures
description: Bob Blobinson is on his way to buy furnitures ! But a great challenge awaits him on his way. Help him navigate through the maze that is the furniture shop, and walk him through numerous colour-based obstacles ! Mr. Blobinson can destroy the walls that bear his colour, so walk through the paint spills and paint buckets to change his colour and overcome the many obstacles on his way !
